Grocer Vollodos: Collect materials for studies of monsters living in the County. Killing Decomposers of dead bodies, corpses, Corpses Shredding Sinks, Plague of beetles, Infested or rotten and Decayed Roots Disputes, You can get the Rotten Bile ... And killing Marsh, swamp of assassins, Persecutors Marsh Guardians, collectors, Trusted Advisers of blood and blood- Rotten Blood. Gather for 20 pieces each subject. This will really help our research. Gather these materials for research and bring them to me. I will issue an award for your anguish. I wish you all the best!
